title: Game Changers
overview: The history behind the most iconic games and how they went on to influence the world of pop culture and beyond will be explored in Game Changers, From Pong to Call of Duty and Monopoly to Minecraft,this eight-part limited series dives into the little-known backstories of how these wildly popular and successful games were created. Interviews with inventors, journalists, video game enthusiasts, authors and more reveal the brilliant inspiration and dirty deals that brought these games to the public.Â
